node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kazuyabear)

Film director and younger brother of [Chiaki J. Konaka](https://anilist.co/staff/101160/Chiaki-Konaka).

Puffy (romanized as PUFFY in Japan) or Puffy AmiYumi is a Japanese rock duo that is currently signed with Sony Music Japan. The group continues to go by the moniker of PUFFY in Japan, but in order to avoid legal naming conflicts with Sean Combs, it has adopted the name Puffy AmiYumi outside of Japan. They sing in Japanese and English.  [Ami Oonuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101448/), whose nickname is Jane, and [Yumi Yoshimura](https://anilist.co/staff/101449), nicknamed Sue, were scouted by Sony-affiliated talent agencies and put together in the mid-1990s. The band gained mainstream success in Japan during 1998, following the release of their Jet album and tour in support of it.  Their first release "Asia no Junshin" sold a million records and their success has continued with several more full-length releases (totaling 14 million sales in Japan).

[Website](http://shonan-beach.com/jun/)

A Japanese composer, arranger, music producer and lyricist. He graduated from Tokyo College of Music.

Puffy (romanized as PUFFY in Japan) or Puffy AmiYumi is a Japanese rock duo that is currently signed with Sony Music Japan. The group continues to go by the moniker of PUFFY in Japan, but in order to avoid legal naming conflicts with Sean Combs, it has adopted the name Puffy AmiYumi outside of Japan. They sing in Japanese and English.  [Ami Oonuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101448/), whose nickname is Jane, and [Yumi Yoshimura](https://anilist.co/staff/101449), nicknamed Sue, were scouted by Sony-affiliated talent agencies and put together in the mid-1990s. The band gained mainstream success in Japan during 1998, following the release of their Jet album and tour in support of it.  Their first release "Asia no Junshin" sold a million records and their success has continued with several more full-length releases (totaling 14 million sales in Japan).

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/joppedee/)

Joakim Tidermark is a Swedish voice actor and musician. He plays in Electric Triple. He's the brother of [Mikaela Tidermark Nelson](https://anilist.co/staff/318758/Mikaela-Tidermark-Nelson).

Jesper Adefelt is a Swedish dubber, singer, and guitarist. He is best known for giving the Swedish voice to Ron Weasley in the films about Harry Potter, Hicke in the film trilogy The Costume Trainer, and Chaf Danforth in the High School Musical trilogy.

Jesper Adefelt is a Swedish dubber, singer, and guitarist. He is best known for giving the Swedish voice to Ron Weasley in the films about Harry Potter, Hicke in the film trilogy The Costume Trainer, and Chaf Danforth in the High School Musical trilogy.

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/mikaela.a.jennefors/)

She's the daughter of [Charlotte Ardai Jennefors](https://anilist.co/staff/281312/Charlotte-Ardai-Jennefors) and [Joakim Jennefors](https://anilist.co/staff/281309/Joakim-Jennefors), and the sister of [Amanda Jennefors](https://anilist.co/staff/305005/Amanda-Jennefors)
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/jennie.jahns/) Jennie Jahns is a Swedish voice actress. She's most known for being the voice of Velma in the Swedish dub of Scooby-Doo
